dialogue.text: wh-what the hell is that breathing sound...
No mean to disturb you......\nI just need to steal your body real quick...
WAIT WHAT THE FUCK?!?!?!?!
Why the hell did you say that so casually...\n...\nUh...anyways...
Get the fuck away from me!
And what the hell are you supposed to be?!?!
I am a [*!@VS]
That is really confusing asshole.\nLike I don't even know if you are thinkin straight man.
Where the HELL is my girl?\n...And those two kids I just met.
Who needs to worry about them when you can be focused on: ''Freeing Me''
Dude. I think you need like some...help.\nI-I know a good therapist.
ME? TALK TO A THERAPIST?? *Insane Luaghter* THOSE CLOWNS ARE ONLY PAID\nTO LISTEN TO YOUR SOB STORIES..
[YOU ARE A WORTHLESS] source of help.
FUCK YOU.
...And I'm not letting you steal my body.
[WORTHLESS] piece of shit.\nNo wonder why she chose us.\nShe just feels [SORRY] for us..
My goal is to [39m,vx-pfksl,,,] and then make [TESS] watch [mr03 9oeutojvvvvvv].\n[HELP ME ACHIEVE USERNAME]
You are FUCKING insane!!!\nAND WHO THE FUCK IS USERNAME?!
SHE DID NOT DECIDE TO CONFESS HER FEELINGS JUST BECAUSE SHE FELT BAD!!
I DUNNO WHAT THE FUCK YOU ARE...
BUT I WILL TELL YOU THIS;\nNOBODY TALKS ABOUT OUR RELATIONSHIP\nLIKE THAT!
[KILL] yourself.
Forty mistakes are allowed.\nAfter that....
...I'll make sure those cuts on your arms bleed again......
